text: I haven't  been there in awhile but the last time I was there with friends it was horrible. Drink prices were nuts, the dances lasted only about 1 minute cause they actually cut the songs and then to top it all off as someone has said don't use your credit card. We were there for a good 30 minutes disputing a bill of $2k when my friend only had 2 drinks and no dances cause he was at the bar. They only settled when we said call the cops. He still ended up paying for more than the two drinks and it was well over a month before the change was visible on his credit card. Never again. Stay away from this place at all costs unless you want terrible dances, and rip off of your credit card if you use it.

Great club! I love the remodeling. I've come to this location a few times before they became cover girls. I must say I love how upscale it has become! The girls are great and the servers seem to care. They take time to talk and have AWESOME customer service. Great pricing on drinks compared to most clubs in Vegas!

Cover Girls Las Vegas, is one of the most upscale gentleman's club here in Las Vegas, Not only is there an amazing steak house, great music, and gorgeous women, The customer service is amazing, the staff makes sure to go out of their way to make sure your time there is fun, entertaining, and as accommodating as possible about 30,000 sq feet you can enjoy yourself on the main floor, or visit one of our several VIP areas.  Happy hour is always a good time to come in and drink for unbeatable prices, Industry night every Tuesday from 9 to 1am they offer free well drinks, $3 call and imports, and $5 premium's ur a local or just in Vegas on vacation and ready to party come in and visit the newest strip club in Las  Vegas.....THIS CLUB IS A MUST SEE, AND HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR ALL THAT IS LOOKING FOR A GOOD TIME ***** STARS FOR SURE.

This club has undergone some major renovations and looks amazing.  They not only have the look but also have an amazing staff who truly take time to make everyone in your parties experience amazing!  The host take time out to seat your party and always take care of you.  The drink prices are definitely reasonable considering other clubs in the area and the servers go above and beyond!!  Honestly the best club i have been to in vegas!!

Best Looking Strip Club I Have Ever Been In And I Have Been In Them All In Vegas. The Club Looks Like It Was Built In Rome Picked Up And Dropped Off Here In Sin City. The Club Inside Is Huge Plenty Of Space To Move Around Plenty Of Bar Located All Over The Club. One Main Stage That Puts The Dancer Thats On Stage On Showtime Like Presentation Which You Can See Comes Out When The Dancers Are On Stage. Which Makes For A Gentlemen's Club Feel. Cigars Are Available. All You Have To Is Ask. The Floor Host Are Very Helpful. Bar Staff Is Top Of The Line You Can Tell Management  Went Above And Beyond Finding The Right Staff. The Music Sounds Way Better Then Ever Before You Can Hear That They Put Money Into The Sound System. Which Brings Me To The DJ's Which Are The Main Show Of Any Strip Club. The DJ's Here Sound Great have Great Things To Say And The Music Is Grown Up But Not Trashy. From Top To Bottom I Think This Could And Will Be One Of The Finest Topless Clubs In Las Vegas
I can't figure who's boobs I wanna grab when i come into this place! Always a good time and the  Dj here lays it down! Dj Jesse James is the sh**!
